title: Enchanting Emerald and Diamond Cascade Necklace - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Crafted in high-purity Gold (estimated 22K or 916 gold)
adorned with meticulously selected Emeralds and dazzling GH color Diamonds. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen and vibrant color.
features: This exquisite necklace features a modern Haaram design with a graceful cascade of emeralds and diamonds. The rectangular Emeralds are individually prong-set, creating a stunning contrast against the brilliance of the pave-set diamonds. The intricate diamond work around each emerald adds depth and dimension, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship.
colors: with vibrant emerald green and sparkling white diamonds. The emeralds provide a rich
luxurious contrast against the neutral tones of the gold and diamonds.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties and special events where you want to make a statement.
description: This necklace offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and contemporary design. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures lasting brilliance. The Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster, adding to the piece's overall value and appeal. This is a statement piece that will be cherished for generations.
